text: Eteke mucha'i yetiya te'omra myada purna karaara pichata saparaiyale yatraa karaile, tetiya te'om tura parbatara phale ju'i dekha pale. Te'om paraiyalabargaka ka’le, ‘tomaloke apeksa karaa, ma'i ju'i dekhicho, sambharata ma'i tara paraa tomalokara babe kono khabara anima na'iba edokhara andharaake lai ahima yate tomaloke ju'i puraaba paraa’
